mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_notify (to_user_id, type, title, content, link, is_read, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{toUserId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{link}, 0, 0, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.select: SELECT id, to_user_id, type, title, content, link, is_read, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM bus_notify WHERE to_user_id = #{toUserId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY is_read ASC, create_time DESC, id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_notify SET is_read = 1, update_time = NOW(3) WHERE to_user_id = #{toUserId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND is_read = 0
